metadata.title: CVE-2021-26119 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Smarty before 3.1.39 allows a Sandbox Escape because$smarty.template_object can be accessed in sandbox mode.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-26119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

smarty3 - 3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: smarty3 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.31+20161214.1.c7d42e4+selfpack1-3ubuntu0.1').
